attributes.title: Horrible 😤😤
attributes.review: This app took 22 days to download! Super disappointed! It even hacked my phone and deleted all of my iCloud storage, very disappointed that this is what our world has come too.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: it’s so awfullllll ! I can not stress this enough , DONT GET IT ! it makes my phone crash n I have to restart it just to get it off the app ! it’s not even useful ! please Apple take it down already !

attributes.title: do nOt download!
attributes.review: it took me A YEAR to download and when it did it told me to give them my number, no thank you and second it tried to make me buy a t-shirt and vote for trump. this app cant tell me what to do😴🧚🏻‍♂️✨❤️

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: This app has bugs hacked into my phone and wiped out half of my phone data I would rather you not to download memory loss on my phone I hate the app do NOT download thank you

attributes.title: This app is not good
attributes.review: The app took so long to download and it never even worked every time I tried to open it it would glitch and shut off.

attributes.title: Very bad
attributes.review: This app took 1 day to download after opening Donald trump was staring into my eyes I do not want to see this!this app is horrible not to mention the slow speed overall of the app

attributes.title: how the trump app killed my dog
attributes.review: i first downloaded this app because sherry told me too. and guess what my dog saw and jumped out the window when i said i would ✨didn’t stop me tho. i just wanted to appreciate my cheeto president but he KILLED MY DOG

attributes.title: Bugs??
attributes.review: It’s a really poor design. It’s hard to navigate and doesn’t provide me with necessary information. I would not be surprised if it had a bug.

attributes.title: That app hacked my phone
attributes.review: After i downloaded the app my phone started to glitch and turned off immediately so I turned on back and deleted this app🤮🤢

attributes.title: 1 star rate
attributes.review: This app was really slow it took like a day and a half to download it. I don’t believe this app should be here if it takes that long. Also this app deleted all of my hentai and my pornos.
